name: Asylum Escape (c0ffi124)
description:
Welcome to the asylum. What brings you here? 

You have woken up in an asylum room, not knowing why and how you got here. The Player's goal is to escape the randomly generated maze without being scared to death. But the mind starts playing tricks and the hospital is rapidly starting to become a maze you can’t escape from. You need to move fast, but even your mind can’t be trusted. Who are you? Why are you so, so scared of blood? With every interaction, you become more and more unstable.

CONTROLS

  • Use WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Use mouse to move camera
